channel.title: Pages on Inderjit Singh Chahal
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Inderjit Singh Chahal

item.title: About me
item.author: inder@inderjit.in (Inderjit Singh Chahal)
item.description: My name is Inderjit Singh Chahal. I am Google Certified Professional Machine Learning Engineer I enjoy working on challenging things that are new different and rare in their implementation. I like to spend hours optimizing codes or solving complex problems through simple implementations. I love to design architectures for cloud based applications, I am also a Google Certified Cloud Engineer I enjoy debugging complex challenges in codes, like to contribute on community platforms like StackOverflow, Reddit, etc.

item.title: Demo
item.author: inder@inderjit.in (Inderjit Singh Chahal)
item.description: *{ box-sizing: border-box; } .messageContainer{ width: 100%; border: 1px solid #dddddd; } .messageForm{ padding: 15px; } .messageForm label{ display: block; margin-bottom: 5px; } .messageForm .messageField{ display: block; width: 100%; margin-bottom: 5px; height: 80px; padding: 10px; border: 1px solid #cdcdcd; } .messageForm .messageField:focus{ outline: none; } .messageForm .sendButton{ padding: 8px 15px; background: #008b2a; border: 1px solid #016b21; color: #ffffff; font-weight: bold; font-size: 14px; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; display: flex; } .

item.title: Portfolio
item.author: inder@inderjit.in (Inderjit Singh Chahal)
item.description: Projects What I have created so far Echo Cardiogram Autonomous - E2E Deep-learning A ROBOTIC INTELLIGENT RADIOLOGIST ...... A fully automated device to test and quantify the functions of a radiologist using state of the art Artificial intelligence and mathematical tools to give near human and under some circumstances, better than human results ATM surveillance with suspicious object detectio (OCR) The project was a ...... complete package to monitor and secure Automated teller machiens(ATMs) which was implemented using tensorflow, keras, opencv, Prometheus, grafana, web-sockets etc.
